name: Google+ New Navigation Mod (1920*1080) Chrome Only
description:
Modification for Google+ New Navigation. Provides a larger space for your stream. Note: Search bar removed from Google+
Works best on a resolution of 1920*1080, other resolutions may not be displayed correctly.
additional_info:
This is only a test version of this script.

Modification for Google+ New Navigation. Provides a larger space for your stream. Note: Search bar removed from Google+ and display issue may be found on circles page and photos page.
Works best on a resolution of 1920*1080, other resolutions may not be displayed correctly.
